The Ethereum community seems to stoked about a new Apple framework called CryptoKit. There are a few misconceptions I’d like to clear up. (Thread)

Ethereum nodes in a nutshell: Ethereum computes the state transition S(state_n, block_(n+1)) -> state_(n+1).  Full nodes compute this and store all blocks and the latest state.  Archive nodes compute this and store all blocks and all states.
